job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Deep learning expertise comes with a wealth of experience in developing algorithms and applying them to solve a wide variety of problems. From speech recognition and natural language processing, to computer vision, stock forecasting and autonomous systems - a deep learning specialist can help create intelligent and innovative systems that remain ahead of their time.

   Here's some projects that our expert Deep Learning Specialists have made real:
     * Delivering realistic augmented reality experiences by overlaying images into live video streams
     * Developing more accurate methods of classification by recognizing patterns on audio or visual data
     * Using CNNs or SVMs to detect security threats from incoming financial data
     * Creating facial recognition models that respond to eye blinks
     * Developing distance measurement models using deep learning for object detection
     * Deploying a Machine Learning model for a given time series sensor signal data
     * Using Reinforcement Learning methodology to train agents engaged in complex tasks

   As you can see, there is virtually no limit to the potential applications for deep learning. With Freelancer.com's talented pool of specialists, your business can benefit from the expertise of experts who are well versed in deep learning techniques as well as state-of-the art technologies like YOLO, OpenCV, PyTorch and more. Take your project to the next level by hiring a knowledgeable Deep Learning Specialist on Freelancer.com and receive a custom solution tailored to your specific needs.

   I'm seeking a skilled professional to construct a Pedestrian Dead Reckoning (PDR) model, focusing on high-accuracy location, heading, and floor level estimations. The model should leverage data from various smartphone sensors, specifically , gyroscope, barometer, accelerometer, and magnetometer. Key requirements include: - Strong understanding of sensor-data interpretation. - Extensive experience with PDR modelling. - Contribute towards achieving high-accuracy results (within a few meters). Your expertise will be instrumental in refining the reliability and precision of the PDR model.
job_details.full_text:
Developer

Deep learning expertise comes with a wealth of experience in developing algorithms and applying them to solve a wide variety of problems. From speech recognition and natural language processing, to computer vision, stock forecasting and autonomous systems - a deep learning specialist can help create intelligent and innovative systems that remain ahead of their time.

   Here's some projects that our expert Deep Learning Specialists have made real:
     * Delivering realistic augmented reality experiences by overlaying images into live video streams
     * Developing more accurate methods of classification by recognizing patterns on audio or visual data
     * Using CNNs or SVMs to detect security threats from incoming financial data
     * Creating facial recognition models that respond to eye blinks
     * Developing distance measurement models using deep learning for object detection
     * Deploying a Machine Learning model for a given time series sensor signal data
     * Using Reinforcement Learning methodology to train agents engaged in complex tasks

   As you can see, there is virtually no limit to the potential applications for deep learning. With Freelancer.com's talented pool of specialists, your business can benefit from the expertise of experts who are well versed in deep learning techniques as well as state-of-the art technologies like YOLO, OpenCV, PyTorch and more. Take your project to the next level by hiring a knowledgeable Deep Learning Specialist on Freelancer.com and receive a custom solution tailored to your specific needs.

   I'm seeking a skilled professional to construct a Pedestrian Dead Reckoning (PDR) model, focusing on high-accuracy location, heading, and floor level estimations. The model should leverage data from various smartphone sensors, specifically , gyroscope, barometer, accelerometer, and magnetometer. Key requirements include: - Strong understanding of sensor-data interpretation. - Extensive experience with PDR modelling. - Contribute towards achieving high-accuracy results (within a few meters). Your expertise will be instrumental in refining the reliability and precision of the PDR model.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and application of predictive models using deep learning techniques, including algorithm development, data interpretation from sensors, and model training for tasks like classification, object detection, and time series analysis. While software development is implied for deployment, the core focus is on the modeling aspect and achieving high accuracy with these models, aligning with the definition and evidence profile of an ML Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly asks to 'construct a Pedestrian Dead Reckoning (PDR) model' and mentions 'developing algorithms and applying them', 'developing more accurate methods of classification', 'Using CNNs or SVMs', 'Creating facial recognition models', 'Developing distance measurement models', 'Deploying a Machine Learning model for a given time series sensor signal data', and 'Using Reinforcement Learning methodology to train agents'.
job_tasks.phrase: construct a Pedestrian Dead Reckoning (PDR) model

job_tasks.justification: The description highlights experience in 'developing algorithms and applying them to solve a wide variety of problems' and mentions specific applications like 'speech recognition and natural language processing, to computer vision, stock forecasting and autonomous systems'.
The job mentions 'developing more accurate methods of classification by recognizing patterns on audio or visual data'.
job_tasks.phrase: developing more accurate methods of classification

job_tasks.justification: The job mentions 'Using CNNs or SVMs to detect security threats from incoming financial data'.
The job mentions 'Creating facial recognition models that respond to eye blinks'.
The job mentions 'Developing distance measurement models using deep learning for object detection'.
The job mentions 'Deploying a Machine Learning model for a given time series sensor signal data'.
job_tasks.phrase: Deploying a Machine Learning model for a given time series sensor signal data

job_tasks.justification: The job mentions 'Using Reinforcement Learning methodology to train agents engaged in complex tasks'.

The job requires leveraging data from 'various smartphone sensors, specifically , gyroscope, barometer, accelerometer, and magnetometer' and has a 'Strong understanding of sensor-data interpretation'.

The description mentions 'create intelligent and innovative systems' and 'building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems' (though this is more general to GenAI, the context here leans towards deploying models). The phrase 'Deploying a Machine Learning model' also implies software development aspects.
